items.content_html: ZenithDB is a simple lightweight, easy-to-use database for Node.js with support for aggregation, replication, and concurrency. Its simple API enables you to store and query data quickly and easily, without the need for a complex database management system. Add ZenithDB to your Node.js projects for fast and efficient database functionality.

Its simple API enables you to store and query data quickly and easily, without the need for a complex database management system. Add ZenithDB to your Node.js projects for fast and efficient database functionality.
